Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: The decision to blame Taylor’s boyfriend for her death, and not the officers, is another stark reminder of the need for the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act, which includes ending qualified immunity, advocates said.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: The decision to blame Taylor’s boyfriend for her death, and not the officers, is another stark reminder of the need for the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act, which includes ending qualified immunity, advocates said.

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Black people are more susceptible to nonfatal police violence than being killed by police, the report found.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: Black people are more susceptible to nonfatal police violence than being killed by police, the report found.

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Since 2020, the number of people, especially Black people, killed by the police has continued to rise, according to the Mapping Police Violence database.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Since 2020, the number of people, especially Black people, killed by the police has continued to rise, according to the Mapping Police Violence database.

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Researchers behind Mapping Police Violence released a new database Wednesday that focuses on nonfatal police encounters in the United States between 2017 and 2022, the Guardian first reported.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Researchers behind Mapping Police Violence released a new database Wednesday that focuses on nonfatal police encounters in the United States between 2017 and 2022, the Guardian first reported.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Christopher 2X, a longtime community organizer, and friend of Taylor’s family, said, “I was just thinking about her mother [Tamika Palmer] in regards to how she would interpret that particular ruling by the judge.”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: longtime community organizer, and friend of Taylor’s family
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Christopher 2X, a longtime community organizer, and friend of Taylor’s family, said, “I was just thinking about her mother [Tamika Palmer] in regards to how she would interpret that particular ruling by the judge.”

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Christopher 2X said Harris should talk more on the campaign trail about policing reforms.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: longtime community organizer, and friend of Taylor’s family
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Christopher 2X, a longtime community organizer, and friend of Taylor’s family, said, “I was just thinking about her mother [Tamika Palmer] in regards to how she would interpret that particular ruling by the judge.”

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Hawk Newsome, co-founder of Black Lives Matter of Greater New York and Black Opportunities, wrote in an email to Capital B that the organization’s Black Agenda 2024 consists of dozens of proposed policies created by a multigenerational group of leaders from across the country, and for people who “don’t attend your churches or community meetings, engage in local politics, or take your polls.”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: co-founder of Black Lives Matter of Greater New York and Black Opportunities
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Hawk Newsome, co-founder of Black Lives Matter of Greater New York and Black Opportunities, wrote in an email to Capital B that the organization’s Black Agenda 2024 consists of dozens of proposed policies created by a multigenerational group of leaders from across the country, and for people who “don’t attend your churches or community meetings, engage in local politics, or take your polls.”

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The founder of Game Changers, a nonprofit organization dedicated to educating children about violence in order to end violence in the long term, Christopher 2X said Harris should answer questions about policing reform just like it was a question about the economy.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: The founder of Game Changers, a nonprofit organization dedicated to educating children about violence in order to end violence in the long term, Christopher 2X said Harris should answer questions about policing reform just like it was a question about the economy.
